Text.Page:
, are you any good at jumping?

How about falling?

We need someone to jump through the caved-in floor and descend—plummet, really—to the basement.

There's a scout there, Waqaar, whom we haven't heard from in some time. Check on him, then fight your way back up here when you're done down there.

The bad news: that's the hole you're jumping through. And no, there's no other way down.

The good news: we sent a teleport master down there yesterday, so you should be able to get back.

Assuming the teleport master survived the drop, that is...

What a rush, eh?

I hope you've mastered combat as well as you've mastered gravity, .

We've got a lot of work to do down here.
